description.original: This Obsidian plugin expands or collapses the sidebars based on mouse hovering on the ribbons.
description.translation: This Obsidian plugin expands or collapses the sidebars based on mouse hovering on the ribbons.

dict.Notice('Left Sidebar Expand on Hover Ena: Notice('Left Sidebar Expand on Hover Enabled')
dict.Notice('Left Sidebar Expand on Hover dis: Notice('Left Sidebar Expand on Hover disabled')
dict.Notice('Right Sidebar Expand on Hover En: Notice('Right Sidebar Expand on Hover Enabled')
dict.Notice('Right Sidebar Expand on Hover di: Notice('Right Sidebar Expand on Hover disabled')
dict..setDesc('Toggle to enable/disable left: .setDesc('Toggle to enable/disable left sidebar expand on hover')
dict..setDesc('Toggle to enable/disable right: .setDesc('Toggle to enable/disable right sidebar expand on hover')
dict..setDesc('Set the width of left sidebar: .setDesc('Set the width of left sidebar in pixel unit')
dict..setDesc('Set the width of right sidebar: .setDesc('Set the width of right sidebar in pixel unit')
